entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Chetwynd
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:22 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chetwynd Airport 9:00 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Humidity: 80 %

Wind: WSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries and periods of freezing rain changing to a few rain showers and periods of freezing rain and ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 9:23 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023
